about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Beyond Digital Media Beyond Digital Media is a non-profit organization committed to fostering and celebrating Christian art and culture in all its forms. By partnering with talented artists, musicians, writers, and creatives, we strive to make the beauty of the Gospel accessible to people from every background. Through curated exhibitions, multimedia installations, performances, and community workshops, our goal is not only to showcase art inspired by biblical themes but also to spark conversations about faith, hope, and compassion in a rapidly changing world.

founder.title: Yang Yi, Founder and Artist
founder.description1: Yang Yi is a visionary artist and the founder of Beyond Digital Media, dedicated to pushing the boundaries of contemporary art and digital media.
founder.description2: With over 15 years of multidisciplinary art experience, Yang's work explores the intersection of traditional art forms and cutting-edge technology.
founder.description3: Born in China and educated internationally, Yang combines Eastern philosophical concepts with Western art techniques, bringing a unique cultural perspective to each creation.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to bring art to new heights through innovation and technology. We believe that art can inspire, educate, and change the world.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Our vision is to become a leader in art and media innovation, creating memorable experiences for global audiences.
